stages.intro_zh: 插入電源線並用USB-C連至電腦。將攝影機、電腦、遊戲主機等HDMI輸入口連接到ATEM Mini ISO的HDMI端口（1~4）。可使用麥克風或其他音源（3.5mm）輸入到AUDIO IN。按HDMI 1~4按鍵切換出現在直播畫面或錄製中的輸入源。
stages.intro_en: Plug in the power cable and connect the USB-C cable to your computer. Connect cameras, computers, game consoles, etc., to HDMI inputs (1~4) on the ATEM Mini ISO. Connect microphones or audio sources (3.5mm) to AUDIO IN. Use HDMI 1–4 buttons to select which source appears on the program output or stream.

quiz.question_zh: ATEM Mini ISO 最多可接幾組HDMI影像源？
quiz.question_en: How many HDMI video inputs does the ATEM Mini ISO support?

quiz.question_zh: 麥克風應插在 ATEM Mini ISO 的哪個接口？
quiz.question_en: Where do you plug in the microphone on the ATEM Mini ISO?

quiz.question_zh: 如何切換直播畫面的畫面來源？
quiz.question_en: How do you switch sources for the stream output?

quiz.question_zh: USB-C可同時作為視訊捕捉介面嗎？
quiz.question_en: Can USB-C connection be used as a video capture interface?

quiz.question_zh: ATEM Mini ISO 可以單獨用於直播操作嗎？
quiz.question_en: Can the ATEM Mini ISO be used alone for live switching?

stages.intro_zh: 將USB硬碟或SSD插到ATEM側邊USB口，再用軟體設定啟動ISO錄製。每個HDMI輸入都可自動儲存單獨影像檔及一條剪接好的總檔。透過音訊旋鈕或ATEM軟體調整各輸入音量及靜音。按下畫面切換或子母畫面按鍵可添加特效。
stages.intro_en: Plug a USB drive/SSD into ATEM side USB port, then enable ISO recording in software. Every HDMI input gets an individual recording file, plus a single program file. Use audio knobs or ATEM software to adjust/mute audio levels per channel. Use transition/Picture-in-Picture (PiP) buttons for special effects.

quiz.question_zh: 開啟ISO錄製需插什麼裝置？
quiz.question_en: What device should you plug in to enable ISO recording?

quiz.question_zh: ISO錄製能同時分軌存檔與儲存總檔嗎？
quiz.question_en: Can ISO recording save both individual and program files at the same time?

quiz.question_zh: 如何調整各HDMI聲音輸入音量？
quiz.question_en: How do you adjust audio levels for each HDMI input?

quiz.question_zh: 螢幕上子母畫面功能英文是什麼？
quiz.question_en: What is the English term for “子母畫面” on the ATEM Mini ISO?

quiz.question_zh: 切換特效可以按什麼實現？
quiz.question_en: What button do you press to apply transitions?

stages.intro_zh: 用USB-C當Webcam來源輸出，OBS直接辨識切換台畫面。HDMI OUT端口可連接大螢幕或額外錄影機進行同步監看與備份。透過HDMI OUT與另一台ATEM串接，進行更大規模製作。結合調音台、燈控台等形成完整直播系統。
stages.intro_en: Use USB-C as a webcam source; OBS will detect the ATEM as a camera. HDMI OUT port connects to monitors/recorders for live view/backup. Use HDMI OUT/IN to link multiple ATEMs for larger productions. Integrate mixers, light controllers for a complete live studio system.

quiz.question_en: How does a computer recognize the ATEM Mini ISO via USB-C?

quiz.question_en: HDMI OUT can be connected to what devices?

quiz.question_en: Can you chain multiple ATEMs for a larger switcher system?

quiz.question_zh: OBS與ATEM結合時, ATEM會被視為？
quiz.question_en: When connected to OBS, ATEM is treated as?

quiz.question_zh: 可以結合哪些設備強化現場直播系統？
quiz.question_en: What devices can be integrated for a better live system?
